code:
```verilog
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic in1,
    input logic in2,
    output logic out
);

    always @(*) begin
        out = ~(in1 | in2); // out = ~(in1 | in2)
    end

endmodule
[DONE]
```

issues: Numeric constants should have explicit size (e.g., 1'b0 not 0)
